trans-unit.source: Provides the mobile text writer adapter class for the WML device adapter set specifically designed for Openwave's UP browser.
trans-unit.target: 提供 WML 裝置配接器是專門針對 Openwave 的瀏覽器設定的行動裝置的文字寫入器配置器類別。

trans-unit.source: This call can be followed by calls to render text or by a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlMobileTextWriter.RenderImage%2A> method to render the hyperlink contents, followed by a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlMobileTextWriter.RenderEndHyperlink%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此呼叫後面都可以接著呼叫來呈現文字，或呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlMobileTextWriter.RenderImage%2A>方法以呈現超連結內容中，後面接著呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlMobileTextWriter.RenderEndHyperlink%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlMobileTextWriter.RenderEndHyperlink%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.UpWmlMobileTextWriter.RenderImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL target.
trans-unit.target: URL 目標。

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the URL is encoded.
trans-unit.target: 設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 URL 編碼。

trans-unit.source: The softkey text to use for the link if the `mapToSoftkey` parameter is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的連結，如果螢幕鍵盤文字`mapToSoftkey`參數設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the softkey label comes from the adapter itself (the default label, or something else that is adapter-specified, such as "Call" for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.PhoneCall"></xref> control), rather than being a softkey label explicitly specified by the application author.
trans-unit.target: 設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果螢幕鍵盤標籤來自配接器本身 (預設標籤，或其他項目所指定配接器，例如 「 呼叫 」 <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.PhoneCall"> </xref>控制項)，而不是由應用程式作者明確指定的螢幕鍵盤標籤。

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if mapping to a softkey on the device.
trans-unit.target: 設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若對應是螢幕鍵盤的裝置上。

trans-unit.target: 要呈現的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a break must follow the element.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否必須接著分行符號項目。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the text must be encoded.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否必須編碼文字。

trans-unit.source: Renders a text box element.
trans-unit.target: 呈現文字方塊項目。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the control.
trans-unit.target: 識別控制項。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the initial value of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 指定文字方塊的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an optional WML format string.
trans-unit.target: 指定選擇性的 WML 格式字串。

trans-unit.source: Contains the title of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 包含文字方塊標題。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the password.
trans-unit.target: 指定的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the string.
trans-unit.target: 設定字串的大小。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum length of the string.
trans-unit.target: 指定字串的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the identifier for the control (ID) is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要加密的控制項 (ID) 的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a break is required after the control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果呈現控制項之後，中斷是必要的。
